name: Battleship Crusher
description:
This game was created in under 48 for Ludum Dare 41.

The Idea is to combine Arcade Action piloting a battship in space with Match3 gameplay for maintaning Battleship systems.

The game was underdeveloped, and is lacking some mchanics from original idea, and will be developed further to include:

- Sounds.

- Ship upgrades

- Enemy variety.

- Better UI.

- Better graphics in general.
